# Cryptography-PKI-generate-publicPrivatekeyPair

Step 1 : Generate two keys, one for Public, one for Private

Step 2 : Encrypt the Message by using Public key

Step 3 : Decrypt The hashed RSA message by having the Private key


# Output : 

Sun RSA public key, 2048 bits
  
  params: null
  
  modulus: 
  
  public exponent: 65537
  
SunRsaSign RSA private CRT key, 2048 bits

  params: null
  
  modulus: 
  
  private exponent: 

[B@4926097b

Decrypted message: This is PKI Test, Hello PKI!
